title: Gopu and Validity of Arrangement
text: N persons are standing in a line. Height of each person is between 1 and N and height of each person is distinct.You are Â given an array A where A[i] denotes how many persons are there before the i_th person having heights greater than the height of the ith person. For a person i, all the persons from 1 to i - 1 are considered to be before him. eg, For person 2, person 1 is considered before him.You have to find out whether this array can be valid for some arrangement of persons. If you can uniquely do so then output "YES" Otherwise output "NO".InputFirst line contains T : number of test cases. (1 <= T <= 20).For each test First line contains an integer n. (1 <= N <= 10^5)Next line contains n space separated integers denoting A[i]. (0 <= A[i] <= N)OutputFor each test case, output "YES" or "NO" according to answer.ExampleInput:220 121 1Output:YESNOExplanationFor the first test case, [2, 1] is a valid case, First person has height 2, second person has height 1.For the second test case, no valid test case exists.
